thread.title: VIDEO: This 3-year-old is the world's cutest DJ
thread.title_full: VIDEO: This 3-year-old is the world's cutest DJ

author: More Content Now staff
title: VIDEO: This 3-year-old is the world's cutest DJ
text: VIDEO: This 3-year-old is the world's cutest DJ Comment By More Content Now staff Echo Pilot - Greencastle, PA By More Content Now staff Posted Oct. 7, 2015 at 4:36 PM By More Content Now staff Posted Oct. 7, 2015 at 4:36 PM He’s only 3 years old, and he’s already an Internet sensation. DJ Arch Jr. has captivated our hearts since we saw a video clip of the tyke on “South Africa’s Got Talent.” The show’s judges loved him so much that they awarded him with the coveted “golden buzzer,” pushing the pint-sized talent straight to the show’s semifinals. The crowd favorite, whose real name is Oratilwe Hlongwane, discovered his love for music at age 1 , and has been mixing beats ever since. We just wish we had the same kind of drive at that age. By More Content Now staff Echo Pilot - Greencastle, PA By More Content Now staff Posted Oct. 7, 2015 at 4:36 PM
